TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventSchemaTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 将端对端事件的跟踪或调试输出定向到 XML 编码的符合架构的日志文件。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output of end-to-end events to an XML-encoded, schema-compliant log file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供对端到端架构兼容事件的跟踪。The class provides tracing of end-to-end schema-compliant events. 对于具有跨线程、 、进程和计算机边界的异类组件的系统，可以使用端对端跟踪。You can use end-to-end tracing for a system that has heterogeneous components that cross thread, , process, and computer boundaries. 标准化事件架构 (参阅 [事件使用者的事件表示形式](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=78955)) 已定义为在这些边界之间启用跟踪。A standardized event schema (see [Event Representation for Event Consumers](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=78955)) has been defined to enable tracing across these boundaries. 此外，该架构允许添加符合架构的自定义元素。The schema enables the addition of custom, schema-compliant elements. 您可以使用 [服务跟踪查看器工具 ( # A0) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129) 来显示事件数据。You can use the [Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129) to display the event data. 针对无锁定跟踪的隐式支持优化了日志记录性能。 is tuned for logging performance with implicit support for lock-free tracing. 类将跟踪和调试信息转换为 XML 编码的文本流。The class converts tracing and debugging information into an XML-encoded text stream. 本部分后面的表中显示了对 XML 输出的说明。The description of the XML output is shown in the tables later in this section. 您可以 通过应用程序配置文件启用或禁用对象，然后 在您的应用程序中使用配置的对象。You can enable or disable an object through the application configuration file, and then use the configured object in your application. 或者，您可以 在代码中创建对象。Alternately, you can create an object in your code. 建议通过应用程序配置文件启用跟踪侦听器。We recommend that you enable trace listeners through the application configuration file. 有关使用配置文件进行跟踪和调试的信息，请参阅 [跟踪和调试设置架构](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/)。For information about the use of configuration files for tracing and debugging, see [Trace and Debug Settings Schema](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/). 若要配置 对象，请修改对应于应用程序名称的配置文件。To configure an object, modify the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，您可以添加、删除或设置侦听器的属性。In this file, you can add, remove, or set the properties for a listener. 配置文件的格式应如下所示：The configuration file should be formatted as follows: ```xml ``` 类 从基类继承属性 。The class inherits the property from the base class . 属性允许在侦听器上进行额外级别的跟踪输出筛选。The property allows for an additional level of trace output filtering at the listener. 如果存在筛选器，则 `Trace` 跟踪侦听器的方法将调用 筛选器的方法，以确定是否发出跟踪。If a filter is present, the `Trace` methods of the trace listener call the method of the filter to determine whether to emit the trace. 如果尝试写入正在使用或不可用的文件，则会自动将 GUID 后缀添加到文件名。If an attempt is made to write to a file that is being used or is unavailable, a GUID suffix is automatically added to the file name. > [!NOTE] > 侦听器方法旨在由 、和类的方法调用 。Listener methods are intended to be called by methods of the , , and classes. 不要直接从应用程序代码调用侦听器方法。Do not call the listener methods directly from application code. 侦听器主要供 类使用。The listener is primarily intended for use by the class. 下表介绍了 XML 输出的元素和属性。The following table describes the elements and attributes of the XML output. |元素Element|属性Attributes|输出Output|说明Notes| |-------------|----------------|------------|-----------| |`CallStack`|无None|取决于属性中是否存在该 标志 。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|特殊字符（如 > 或 <）将替换为转义序列。Special characters such as > or < are replaced with escape sequences. 请参阅下表中的转义字符转换表。See the escaped character translation table in the next table.| |`Computer`|无None|始终显示。Always present.|此元素表示属性的值 。This element represents the value of the property.| |`Correlation`|`ActivityID`|始终显示。Always present.|如果 `ActivityID` 未指定，则默认值为空 GUID。If `ActivityID` is not specified, the default is an empty GUID.| ||`RelatedActivityID`|取决于 `relatedActivityId` 方法调用中是否存在参数 `Trace` 。Depends on the presence of the `relatedActivityId` parameter in the `Trace` method call.|`RelatedActivityID`特性对应于方法的 `relatedActivityId` 参数 。The `RelatedActivityID` attribute corresponds to the `relatedActivityId` parameter of the method.| |`Data`|无None|始终显示。Always present.|此元素表示参数输入 (`data`) 。This element represents parameter input (`data`). 为每个数据对象提供一个元素。One element is provided for each data object. 对于事件日志， `Data` 元素包含转义的 XML 数据。In the case of event logs, the `Data` element contains escaped XML data. 如果是数据日志， `Data` 元素将包含未转义的数据。In the case of data logs, the `Data` element contains unescaped data. 数据日志输出使用传入的 `ToString` 数据对象的方法。The data log output uses the `ToString` method of the passed-in data objects.| |`Event`|无None|始终显示。Always present.|此元素包含跟踪事件。This element contains a trace event.| |`EventData`|无None|为事件日志提供。Present for event logs.|此元素表示参数输入 (`message` `args`) 。This element represents parameter input (`message`, `args`). 它包含 `Data` 使用通过调用方法创建的转义 XML 数据的元素 。It contains `Data` elements with escaped XML data that is created by calling the method.| |`EventID`|无None|始终显示。Always present.|此元素表示参数输入 (`id`) 。This element represents parameter input (`id`).| |`Execution`|`ProcessID`|取决于属性中是否存在该 标志 。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|`ProcessID`属性在中指定 。The `ProcessID` attribute is specified in the . 在 Microsoft Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition 操作系统上，如果大于 `ProcessID` 2147483647，则表示负数，并且应转换为获取正确的进程标识符。On the Microsoft Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition operating systems, if `ProcessID` is larger than 2,147,483,647, it is a positive representation of a negative number and should be converted to obtain the correct process identifier.| ||`ThreadID`|存在时显示 `ProcessID` 。Present when `ProcessID` is present.|`ThreadID`属性在中指定 。The `ThreadID` attribute is specified in the .| |`Level`|无None|始终显示。Always present.|此元素表示参数输入 () 的数值 `eventType` 。This element represents parameter input (the numeric value of `eventType`). 大于255的参数值将输出为级别8，这表示 。Parameter values that are larger than 255 are output as a level 8, which represents . 跟踪事件类型 、、、 和 分别作为级别1、2、4、8和10的输出。Trace event types , , , , and are output as levels 1, 2, 4, 8, and 10, respectively.| |`LogicalOperationStack`|无None|取决于属性中是否存在该 标志 。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|只能存在一个逻辑操作。Only one logical operation can exist. 因此，这些值在 `LogicalOperation` 元素下作为节点写入 `LogicalOperationStack` 。Therefore, the values are written as `LogicalOperation` nodes under the `LogicalOperationStack` element.| |`OpCode`|无None|当 `Level` 大于255时存在。Present when `Level` is greater than 255.|此元素表示数值大于255的跟踪事件类型。This element represents Trace event types that have numeric values greater than 255. 、、、 或 分别输出为级别1、2、4、8和10。, , , , or are output as levels 1, 2, 4, 8, and 10, respectively.| |`Provider`|`GUID`|始终显示。Always present.|始终为空。Always empty.| |`RenderingInfo`|`Culture`|始终显示。Always present.|此属性表示事件类型的资源字符串。This attribute represents a resource string for the event type. 它始终为 "en-us \\ "。It is always "en-EN\\".| |`System`|`Name`|始终显示。Always present.|| |`TimeCreated`|`SystemTime`|取决于属性中是否存在该 标志 。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|时间是属性的值 。The time is the value of the property. 此属性表示为协调世界时This property is expressed as Coordinated Universal Time| |`TimeStamp`|无None|取决于属性中是否存在该 标志 。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|此元素在中指定 。This element is specified in the .| |`UserData`|无None|为数据日志提供。Present for data logs.|此元素包含 `Data` 来自方法的、用户提供的非转义数据的元素 。This element contains `Data` elements with unescaped, user-provided data from a method.| 下表显示了在 XML 输出中转义的字符。The following table shows the characters that are escaped in the XML output. 转义发生在除元素之外的所有元素和属性中 `UserData` ，该元素包含用户提供的非转义数据。Escaping occurs in all the elements and attributes except for the `UserData` element, which contains user-provided, unescaped data. `UserData`元素是对方法的调用的结果 。The `UserData` element is a result of calls to the method. |转义字符Escaped character|“值”Value| |-----------------------|-----------| |&|&| |\<|<| |>|>| |""|"| |\|'| |0xD0xD|&\#XD&\#xD;| |0xA0xA|&\#XA&\#xA;| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 出于性能考虑， `bufferSize` `maximumFileSize` 应为1024字节的倍数。For performance considerations, `bufferSize` and `maximumFileSize` should be multiples of 1024 bytes. `maximumFileSize` 不是绝对值，它是一个可超出最后一条消息大小的阈值。`maximumFileSize` is not an absolute value, it is a threshold which can be exceeded up to the size of the last message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. summary.span: 获取输出缓冲区的大小。

span.span: Gets the size of the output buffer.

value.span: 输出缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size of the output buffer, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值由 `bufferSize` 构造函数中的参数设置。The property value is set by the `bufferSize` parameter in the constructor. 出于性能原因，缓冲区大小应设置为1024字节的倍数。For performance reasons, the buffer size should be set to a multiple of 1024 bytes. 为了获得最佳性能，我们建议默认大小为 32 \* 1024 字节或 64 \* 1024 字节。We recommend either the default size of 32\*1024 bytes or 64\*1024 bytes for best performance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示属性的值 。The following code example demonstrates how to display the value of the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener/vb/program.vb#5)]

summary.span: 关闭该侦听器的日志文件，以使其不再接收跟踪或调试输出。

span.span: Closes the log file for this listener so that it no longer receives tracing or debugging output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的自定义属性可在 XML 配置文件中使用，以控制类的实例的行为 。The custom attributes that are returned by this method can be used in the XML configuration file to control the behavior of an instance of the class. 使用任何其他特性会导致配置异常。Using any other attribute causes a configuration exception. 的 方法 返回以下字符串数组值： "bufferSize"、"logRetentionOption"、"maximumFileSize" 和 "maximumNumberOfFiles"。The method for the returns the following string array values: "bufferSize", "logRetentionOption", "maximumFileSize", and "maximumNumberOfFiles".

summary.span: 获取日志文件的最大大小。

span.span: Gets the maximum size of the log file.

value.span: 最大文件大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum file size, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值由 `maximumFileSize` 构造函数中的参数或 `maximumFileSize` 配置文件中的属性设置。The property value is set by the `maximumFileSize` parameter in the constructor or the `maximumFileSize` attribute in the configuration file. 出于性能原因，应将最大文件大小设置为1024字节的倍数。For performance reasons, you should set the maximum file size to a multiple of 1024 bytes. 属性值不是绝对值; 它是一个可超出最后一条消息大小的阈值。The property value is not an absolute; it is a threshold that can be exceeded up to the size of the last message. 下表显示与每个跟踪日志保留选项关联的文件大小的可能值和默认值。The following table shows the possible and default values for file size that are associated with each trace log retention option. 标记为 "N/A" 的值表示 不检查该属性的 值。The values marked as N/A indicate that the property is not checked for that value. |TraceLogRetentionOptionTraceLogRetentionOption|文件大小上限Maximum file size|默认文件大小Default file size| |-----------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------| ||不可用N/A|-1-1| ||>0>0|4 KB4 KB| ||>0>0|4 KB4 KB| ||>0>0|4 KB4 KB| ||>0>0|4 KB4 KB| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示属性的值 。The following code example demonstrates how to display the value of the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值由 `maximumNumberOfFiles` 构造函数中的参数或 `maximumNumberOfFiles` 配置文件中的属性设置。The property value is set by the `maximumNumberOfFiles` parameter in the constructor or the `maximumNumberOfFiles` attribute in the configuration file. 下表显示与每个跟踪日志保留选项关联的文件大小和文件计数的可能和默认值。The following table shows the possible and default values for file size and file count that are associated with each trace log retention option. 标记为 "N/A" 的值表示 不检查该属性的 值。The values marked as N/A indicate that the property is not checked for that value. |TraceLogRetentionOptionTraceLogRetentionOption|最大文件数Maximum number of files|默认文件数Default number of files| |-----------------------------|-----------------------------|-----------------------------| ||不适用N/A|11| ||不适用N/A|11| ||不适用N/A|-1-1| ||>0>0|11| ||>1>1|22| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示属性的值 。The following code example demonstrates how to display the value of the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A data object to emit.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、单个数据对象和事件信息写入日志文件。

span.span: Writes trace information, a single data object, and event information to the log file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`、、 `source` `eventType` 和 `id` 参数在跟踪的页眉和页脚中使用。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. 在 `id` 写入参数之前，将参数转换为无符号整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before it is written. 因此，负值以 `id` 大正整数的形式写入。Therefore, a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `data`参数作为 `Data` 节点写入 `UserData` 元素中。The `data` parameter is written as a `Data` node in the `UserData` element. `ToString`数据对象的方法用于将对象转换为字符串。The `ToString` method of the data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由、和类的方法调用， 用于写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`、、 `source` `eventType` 和 `id` 参数在跟踪的页眉和页脚中使用。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. 在 `id` 写入参数之前，将参数转换为无符号整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before it is written. 因此，负值以 `id` 大正整数的形式写入。Therefore, a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. 参数数组中的对象 `data` 作为 `Data` 元素中的节点写入 `UserData` 。The objects in the `data` parameter array are written as `Data` nodes in the `UserData` element. `ToString`每个数据对象的方法用于将对象转换为字符串。The `ToString` method of each data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由、和类的方法调用， 用于写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`、、 `source` `eventType` 和 `id` 参数在跟踪的页眉和页脚中使用。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. 在 `id` 写入参数之前，将参数转换为无符号整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before it is written. 因此，负值以 `id` 大正整数的形式写入。Therefore, a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. 调用方法，并将 `format` 字符串和 `args` 数组作为参数传入。The method is called and the `format` string and `args` array are passed in as parameters. 此方法设置 `args` 对象数组的格式，并将格式化数组作为 `Data` 元素中的节点写入 `EventData` 。This method formats the `args` object array and writes the formatted array as the `Data` node in the `EventData` element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由、和类的方法调用， 用于写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

span.span: Writes trace information, including the identity of a related activity, a message, and event information, to the log file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于关联相关跟踪。The method is used to correlate related traces. `eventCache`、、 `source` `id` 和 `relatedActivityId` 参数在跟踪的页眉和页脚中使用。The `eventCache`, `source`, `id`, and `relatedActivityId` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. 在 `id` 写入参数之前，将参数转换为无符号整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before it is written. 因此，负值以 `id` 大正整数的形式写入。Therefore, a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message`参数作为 `Data` 元素写入。The `message` parameter is written as the `Data` element. 调用方法将 `relatedActivityId` 值转换为标头中显示的 "B" 格式字符串。The method is called to convert the `relatedActivityId` value to a "B" formatted string, which appears in the header. `Opcode`页脚中的元素将跟踪事件类型标识为 。The `Opcode` element in the footer identifies the trace event type as a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 不应由应用程序代码调用此方法。The method should not be called by application code. 它旨在供 对象用来为其方法发出跟踪信息 。It is intended to be used by a object to emit the trace information for its method.
